cards.projectsDesc: Explore my personal IT projects in great detail with specifications and images for a concise picture.
cards.resourcesDesc: I wanted to have a place where I can collect useful IT resources, and I thought it may be useful for others too.
cards.skillsDesc: A dedicated page to list my skills that I have acquired over the years.
cards.academicDesc: A collection of my academic contributions such as publications and presentations.
